description: ALL IN ONE PHONE HOLDER, LET'S GET YOUR IMAGINATION STARTED!
Indoor Uses

It can be tucked into the headboard of bed or under the mattress, sitting on the desk or chair,strap it around your neck or chest, while you are watching videos, streams,facetime, gaming, reading, cooking, cleaning or sporting in home. No more hand pain holding your phone!
Outdoor Uses

It is a wonderful gadget when you are traveling. You can strap it around your steering wheel in cars, or put it on the front desk on planes, it also can be used as a selfie stand, or recording your own videos outside. Give you a hand in your life!
Universal Mobile Phone Stand Holder for all size Phones from 4.7"-7.4" Length,
such as for iPhone 13 Pro Max, 12 Pro Max,11pro max ,XR ,X 8 7 6S 6 Plus, Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra,S20 Plus,S20Ultra,S10, S8 Plus S7 Edge Note 8, LG, HTC, Nokia Lumia, HUAWEI, etc.
Compatible with all size Tablet and E-reader in 4.7"-7.4" Wide,
such as for iPad Mini 1 2 3 4 5 6 etc. OR some small size Tablet,
if your Tablet PC size over 8inch, then it can not use.
